text: Pavlo Ivanovych Lazarenko (; born 23 January 1953) is a former Ukrainian politician. He was the Prime Minister from 1996 to 1997. In August 2006, he was convicted and sentenced to prison in the United States for money laundering, wire fraud and extortion.Kravets, David. "Former Ukraine leader ordered to prison." Associated Press, 25 August 2006, (Accessed: 4 November 2013 ==References== Category:1953 births Category:Living people Category:Prime ministers of Ukraine
title: Pavlo Lazarenko
